entry.title: WIND WARNING , Fourchu Head

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 1. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40. High minus 1. Wind chill near minus 10. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 8.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Increasing cloudiness overnight. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 before morning. Low minus 8. Wind chill minus 13 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Rain or snow. High 9.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries early in the morning. Rain beginning in the morning. Rainfall amount 10 to 20 mm. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 increasing to 40 gusting to 60 then becoming south 60 gusting to 80 except gusting to 100 over higher terrain in the afternoon. High 9. Wind chill minus 10 in the morning. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Wednesday 25 January 2023
